text: Arash Estilaf (), known as Hua Bobo () is an Iranian actor and TV host active in China. == Life == His birth name is Mohammadjavad Estilaf. He was born in Tehran, Iran and moved to China when he was 17 years old. Estilaf moved to Shanghai in 2006. He started learning Chinese at East China Normal University. In 2008, he joined the first Chinese Bridge language contest for foreign students. He finished in the top 10. Estilaf became popular on Chinese TV as comedian. == References == * Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Iranian actors
title: Arash Estilaf
